data.message:
👋🏼 Eminem - so sad! Rap God proved you were the best rapper of ALL TIME but sadly you want to ditch fans that have made you rich because our beliefs are different!?!??? We supported YOU when you were a drug addict and just like that now it's F off! I'm a conservative that appreciated and supported your courage when faced with continual adversity!
You have "the stage" to unite us yet like many others you're taking the easy road! Thought you were better than that! Heart broken 💔and disappointed! May God Bless this Country 🇺🇸 and all the hate that divides us✌🏽

replies.message: So well said.  Exactly how I feel about this.  Ty.  Sad that he had to do this.
Best comment yet.
Conservative doesn't equal inconsiderate, inhumane jerk. Get your logic in check.
Trump divides us

I've always loved Marshall. And I don't mind if he has 100% different beliefs than me. I always respected him (even if I disagreed with him, because I love his artistry). It's just so disappointing to know that due to the differing opinions, I am not welcome to be his fan now. To tell your fans that love you "fuck you"....that's the only part I care about. You can't watch TV, movies or listen to music now without hearing about politics. Seriously disappointing. 😔
Em said it himself No room for racist white trash in his fan base...sorry  you should probably  go back to listening to country
Arsene Minani Wow. So hateful and ignorant. 😬
Ashli Morett I agree 100%. I understand people say some pretty messed up stuff when they're mad, and i'm going to continue to support even if he "drew the line" It still kinda hurts tho
Ashli Morett No I just hate racists
Ashli Morett I got love for the open minded white people tho👌🏿
Marshall Mathers is smarter than you, Renee. Take a lesson, rather than plugging your ears and going 'la la la la la can't hear you".
Arsene Minani Trump Supporter does not equal racist or "white trash". Also, just because you're white does not mean you listen to country music. All very closed-minded, ignorant comments.
Tim Wirth Good one! 👍🏻

How can you make a claim over the Internet about Em being smarter than Ashli? You know neither of them personally and yet you’re attempting to act like a mediator for intelligence. Because Ashli has a different political view she’s automatically seen to you as dumb? Politics are strictly opinion based and not one side is more “correct” than the other’s because the things they dispute do not have a definitive right or wrong answer. Y’all keep asking the government to solve your/ world problems when the government is the one causing all the problems. Please keep your ignorant, unwanted, and distasteful comments to yourself.

Ashli Morett Okay I admit I crossed the line with the  country music reference... with that said there is no doubt in my mind if you are a Trump supporter you are either OK with racism  or you are  just a plain racist
Tim Wirth how old are you son?
What about all the blacks that supported and voted for Trump? Are they racist?

Renee Millen Old enough to know the difference between a hypocrite and intellectual honesty. Old enough to not have forgotten the travesty that was the Bush administration, as Em ranted about in The Eminem Show. Old enough to not give a shit about ageism.
Miles Sharpless No they're worse they are self hating sellouts
Arsene Minani I am neither of those things.
GTFO
Ashli Morett just like Donald Trump and his gang of despicable minions.. Right?
👋🏼👋🏼 don’t think he’s going to care!!!!
Miles Sharpless  there morons!!
